txt.en: Imrahil can be found outside the front gates of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should speak with Imrahil.

'Well done! Your efforts have weakened the enemy's presence throughout the city, but we must remain vigilant. Even though his armies were vanquished, the spies of Sauron linger, and will do his bidding until their last breath.'

'Although the battle is won, many of Sauron's minions took to hiding within the walls of the city, hoping to ambush the stragglers and wounded during the confusion of battle.\n\n'We cannot allow these creatures to stand. We need to search for any signs of incursion, and eliminate them. The people of Minas Tirith have paid a great price for war, and I wish not to expose them to any further panic.'
Many of Sauron's forces lay in hiding throughout the wreckage, and need to be cleared to reduce any further threats.
Signs of Morgul Lurkers can be found throughout the First Circle in Minas Tirith.\n\nImrahil has asked you to root out and defeat any enemy forces that may be hiding.
